**Objectives of the Project**

    A tidy data set
    A link to a GitHub repository with all the needed files
    A code book which describes the data, vavriables, and any transformations done on the data.
    The R Script which cleans the data

**Cleaning Data Process**

**The cleaning of the data is done through the following process.**

    Import a couple of libraries
    Download the data
    Get the labels and features of the data
    Load the training datasets
    Load the test datasets
    Merge the datasets
    Writing the merged dataset on disk
